spell.death_knights.death_strike.name: Death Strike
spell.death_knights.obliterate.name: Obliterate
spell.death_knights.obliterate.descripti: Strikes a powerful attack against the target, dealing {damage}_0 physical damage and {damage}_1 frost damage. Applies freezing to the target for 2 seconds.
spell.death_knights.frost_strike.name: Frost Strike
spell.death_knights.frost_strike.descrip: Infuse your runeblade with frost, dealing {damage}_1 frost damage and {damage}_0 physical damage. If the victim is frozen, icicles will be be thrown to all nearby enemies, dealing {damage}_1 frost damage.
spell.death_knights.remorseless_winter.d: Surround yourself with a remorseless winter, dealing constant frost damage to all enemies within 8 blocks every second, having a small chance of freezing them for a second every time it deals damage.
spell.death_knights.agonizing_breath.des: Breathe a cone of frost, dealing high frost damage to all enemies in front of you. If no targets are hit, the breath will stop.
